trans-unit.source: Provides an XHTML adapter class for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir en XHTML adapterklasse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: Control or device developers can inherit the XhtmlCalendarAdapter to create a custom adapter to take advantage of a new kind of target device, or to support a custom version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen eller enheten utviklere kan arve XhtmlCalendarAdapter for å opprette en egendefinert kort kan dra nytte av en ny type målenheten, eller for å støtte en egendefinert versjon av den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A custom adapter might override the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnInit%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnLoad%2A> methods to change how the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar> is first presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Et egendefinert kort kan overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnInit%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnLoad%2A>metoder for å endre hvordan <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar>først vises for brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnLoad%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Or, you might change <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.LoadAdapterState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState%2A> to track different information about the state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: Eller du kan endre <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.LoadAdapterState%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState%2A>å spore annen informasjon om tilstanden for kortet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.LoadAdapterState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You might change <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> to modify data structures for a custom calendar, or add custom processing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.Render%2A> method to take advantage of new capabilities in a specific target device.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>å endre datastrukturer for en egendefinert kalender, eller Legg til egendefinert behandlingen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.Render%2A>metode for å utnytte nye funksjoner i en bestemt målenheten.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.Render%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new target device might also have special needs that require modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En ny target-enhet kan også ha bestemte behov som krever endring av <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en forespørselsparameter av sterk type referanse til den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*> according to the user's actions on any primary or secondary page of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>i henhold til brukerhandlinger på en primære eller sekundære side i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName> displays on one or more pages of a mobile device.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>vises på én eller flere sider for en mobil enhet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the user takes an action on one of those pages, this event handler processes the user's response and determines if the user is done with the calendar and whether the adapter should call <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>, or if the user should be directed to one of the secondary pages of the control.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren utfører en handling på én av disse sidene, denne hendelsesbehandlingen behandler brukerens svar og bestemmer om brukeren er ferdig med kalenderen og om adapteren må kalle <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>, eller hvis brukeren rettes til en sekundær sidene kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The target <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*> expressed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Målet <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>uttrykkes som en streng.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because the method always handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> fordi metoden behandler alltid-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the adapter and sets the current <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tilstanden til adapteren og angir gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: Called by the page adapter when loading view state.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av siden adapteren under innlasting av visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> containing the state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder tilstanden for kortet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState*> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState*>for mer informasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState*>

trans-unit.source: Creates event handlers, determines how many months the target device can display, and if the request is not a postback, sets the current date as the calendar's visible date.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter hendelsesbehandling, bestemmer hvor mange måneder målenheten kan vise, og hvis forespørselen ikke er en tilbakesending angir gjeldende dato som den kalenderen synlig dato.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Fills the display list with eras if the user has selected a date and the user's current culture supports eras.
trans-unit.target: Fyller visningslisten med perioder hvis brukeren har valgt en dato og brukerens gjeldende kultur støtter perioder.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> to discover whether the user's current culture supports eras.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>til å finne ut om brukeren for gjeldende kultur støtter perioder.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Renders the calendar, a page of the calendar, or a page of selection options, depending on the user's actions.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir kalenderen, en side med kalenderen eller en side med alternativene, avhengig av brukerens handlinger.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer den gjeldende tilstanden til kortet.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the page adapter during <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av siden adapteren under <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The state of the adapter can include the following information, returned inclusively in the following order: - <xref:System.Object> containing the state of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for adapteren kan ta med følgende informasjon, returneres med i denne rekkefølgen:- <xref:System.Object>som inneholder tilstanden til base klassen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: - `integer` representing the user's currently selected option.
trans-unit.target: - `integer` som representerer brukerens for øyeblikket er valgt.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A> of the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A>for den valgte datoen.</xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A>

trans-unit.source: - `integer` representing the number of eras if the current user's culture supports eras.
trans-unit.target: - `integer` som representerer antallet perioder hvis den gjeldende brukeren kultur støtter perioder.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> containing information about the current state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder informasjon om den gjeldende tilstanden til kortet.</xref:System.Object>
